name: N7 Greaves
description: Dual layer of fabric armor and kinetic padding beneath thick plates of ablative ceramic and lined with additional kinetic barriers.
feature: 5 Shields. --You are considered proficient with this armor even if you lack proficiency with medium armor.
setBonus: Set bonus (3 of 4): Increase your hit points by 1 for each level you have gained. --Set bonus (4 of 4): Increase your hit points by 1 for each level you have gained.
